name: MSStickerBrowserViewController
desc: A view controller that provides dynamic content to the standard sticker browser.

items.name: init(stickerSize: MSStickerSize)
items.desc: Creates a new sticker browser view controller with stickers of the provided size.

items.name: var stickerBrowserView: MSStickerBrowserView
items.desc: The sticker browser view managed by this controller.

items.name: var stickerSize: MSStickerSize
items.desc: A constant that indicates the size of the stickers.
